ProductSortingEnums.Name: NameAsc
ProductSortingEnums.Description: Represents sorting by name: A to Z

ProductSortingEnums.Name: NameDesc
ProductSortingEnums.Description: Represents sorting by name: Z to A

ProductSortingEnums.Name: PriceAsc
ProductSortingEnums.Description: Represents sorting by price: Low to High

ProductSortingEnums.Name: PriceDesc
ProductSortingEnums.Description: Represents sorting by price: High to Low

ProductSortingEnums.Name: CreatedOn
ProductSortingEnums.Description: Represents sorting by product creation date
